ygData.subject: Re: Death takes Phobia
ygData.msgSnippet: The Spear drove deep into Phobias chest, a twisting, burning pain seared through his entire body. He was being punished for his crimes against other Predacons,

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

The Spear drove deep into Phobias chest, a twisting, burning pain seared
through his entire body. He was being punished for his crimes against other
Predacons, in short he was being punished for being a typical Predacon. When
his functions began to fade his back opened up, virtually exploding into
dozens of his babies scattering in all directions the ones hitting death
self destructing, each one like an annoying pinprick, annoying but not
damaging. The rest scattered in all directions trying to dash to safety.


----- Original Message -----
From: <kinger01030@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 17, 2000 3:39 AM
Subject: Re: Death takes Phobia


> Death watched as his prey fell to the ground. Sparks flying from his
> neck..."You are not worthy of this group. And your evil and treachery has
> come back to haunt you." he split is reaper in two and through them down
so
> to hold both of his arms in place at the ground. "Death  takes your spark
to
> HADES!!" he took the spear frombehind his back and drove it at Phobia's
chest.
>
>
>
>
